tool_description: Calculates comprehensive performance metrics for call center agents including handle times, call volumes, and efficiency ratios based on call records.

call_records.description: Array of call record identifiers to analyze

agent_id.description: Specific agent ID to calculate metrics for

include_breaks.description: Whether to include break times in availability calculations

benchmark_period.description: Reference period for performance comparison (daily, weekly, monthly)

error_messages: No call records found: The provided call record identifiers do not exist or are empty.
Invalid agent ID: The specified agent ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid metric types: Use supported metric names like 'handle_time', 'call_volume', 'resolution_rate'.
Invalid benchmark period: Use 'daily', 'weekly', or 'monthly' for benchmark comparison.
Insufficient data: At least one call record is required for metric calculation.
usage: Provide call_records array and agent_id as required parameters. Optionally specify include_breaks, metric_types, and benchmark_period. Returns calculated performance metrics for the agent.

agent_id.description: The agent ID for which metrics were calculated

average_handle_time.description: Average call handle time in seconds

total_calls_handled.description: Total number of calls processed by the agent

availability_percentage.description: Percentage of time agent was available for calls

performance_score.description: Overall performance score based on multiple metrics
